text: The women's 3000 metres in speed skating at the 1994 Winter Olympics took place on 17 February, at the Hamar Olympic Hall. 27 competitors from 14 nations participated in competition. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing world and Olympic records were as follows: ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
